Title: 1. Grease
description: Good girl Sandy Olsson and greaser Danny Zuko fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

Title: 2. National Lampoon's Animal House
description: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

Title: 3. Superman
description: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

Title: 4. Every Which Way But Loose
description: The San Fernando Valley adventures of trucker turned prize-fighter Philo Beddoe and his pet orangutan Clyde.

Title: 5. Jaws 2
description: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

Title: 6. Heaven Can Wait
description: A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.

Title: 7. Hooper
description: Aging Hollywood stuntman Sonny Hooper wants to prove that he's still got what it takes to be a great professional in this risky, under-recognized line of work.

Title: 8. Revenge of the Pink Panther
description: To prove that he still is strong and powerful, Philippe Douvier decides to kill Clouseau. Once news of his "death" has been announced, Clouseau tries to take advantage of it and goes undercover with Cato to find out who tried to kill him.

Title: 9. The Deer Hunter
description: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.

Title: 10. Halloween
description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois, to kill again.

Title: 11. Foul Play
description: A San Francisco librarian picks up a hitchhiker whose car has broken down, which leads to her being stalked and hunted by shady individuals. A cop she briefly met during a function eventually comes to her rescue.

Title: 12. The End
description: Slapstick black comedy about a man (Reynolds) who finds that he hasn't much longer to live and has bungled his attempts at suicide.

Title: 13. Up in Smoke
description: Stoner musicians Pedro DePacas and Anthony "Man" Stoner unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to Los Angeles with incompetent Police Sergeant Stedenko hot on their trail.

Title: 14. Midnight Express
description: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

Title: 15. Coming Home
description: In 1968 California, a woman whose husband is a Marine officer fighting in Vietnam falls in love with a former high school classmate who suffered a paralyzing combat injury in the war.

Title: 16. The Lord of the Rings
description: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.

Title: 17. House Calls
description: Charley is a surgeon who's recently lost his wife. He embarks on a tragicomic romantic quest with woman after woman until he meets up with Ann, a singular woman closer to his own age, who immediately and unexpectedly captures his heart.

Title: 18. Damien: Omen II
description: Damien the Antichrist, now about to turn thirteen years old, finally learns of his destiny under the guidance of an unholy disciple of Satan. Meanwhile dark forces begin to eliminate all those who suspect the child's true identity.

Title: 19. Invasion of the Body Snatchers
description: When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, replicating the city's residents one body at a time.

Title: 20. Convoy
description: Truckers form a mile-long "convoy" in support of a trucker's vendetta with an abusive sheriff - Based on the country song of the same title by C.W. McCall.

Title: 21. The Wiz
description: An adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.

Title: 22. La Cage aux Folles
description: The manager of a Saint-Tropez nightclub featuring drag entertainment, and his star attraction, are a gay couple. Madness ensues when his straight son brings home a fiancée and her ultra-conservative parents to meet them.

Title: 23. F.I.S.T.
description: A rebellious Cleveland warehouse worker rises through the ranks of a trucking industry union to become union president but his organized crime links cause his eventual downfall.

Title: 24. Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
description: A small-town band hits it big, but it must battle a nefarious plot in the music industry.

Title: 25. Eyes of Laura Mars
description: Fashion photographer Laura Mars, whose photographs contain violent images, develops the ability to see through a killer's eyes. Those around her include her driver Tommy, her manager Donald, her ex-husband Michael, and policeman John.

Title: 26. Same Time, Next Year
description: Beginning in 1951, neurotic married accountant George and naive married homemaker Doris have a one-night stand and then meet at the same place once each year. As years go by, they observe changes in each other and their relationship.

Title: 27. The One and Only
description: Henry Winkler portrays an outrageously self-confident but out-of-work actor, a young man who dreams of stardom and leaves college to pursue fame and fortune.

Title: 28. Return from Witch Mountain
description: Tia and Tony visit Los Angeles, but he's quickly kidnapped by an evil scientist, leaving her to desperately search for him.

Title: 29. Corvette Summer
description: High school graduate Kenneth W. Dantley Junior and Vanessa, a hooker-in-training, try to track down his custom-made newly-stolen Corvette.

Title: 30. The Greek Tycoon
description: A fictionalized account of the Greek shipping magnate, Onassis, and his meeting and subsequent marriage to the widow of assassinated U.S. president, Jacqueline Kennedy.

Title: 31. Death on the Nile
description: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can Poirot identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

Title: 32. The Buddy Holly Story
description: The story of the life and career of the early rock and roll singer, from his meteoric rise to stardom, to his marriage and untimely death.

Title: 33. The Big Fix
description: An ex-'60s radical now working as a private eye is hired by an old flame to investigate a political smear campaign. The case becomes more dangerous as it unfolds.

Title: 34. The Great Train Robbery
description: England, 1850s. A master criminal aims to rob a train of a large sum of gold. Security is incredibly tight and the task seems an impossible one. However, he has a plan and just the right people to carry it out.

Title: 35. The Other Side of the Mountain: Part II
description: Jill and mom return to Bishop, renting trucker John's place during a summer getaway years post-tragedy. Jill fights her instant attraction to John, but they ultimately connect, past hurts complicating their romance.

Title: 36. The Legacy
description: An American couple in England stumble upon a rambling mansion where a number of powerful individuals have been summoned by its patriarch regarding the home's legacy.

Title: 37. Moment by Moment
description: Trisha Rawlings, a Beverly Hills socialite, suffers from loneliness following separation from her womanizing husband Stu. Strip, a young drifter, becomes infatuated with her and develops a May/December relationship with her.

Title: 38. Interiors
description: Three sisters find their lives spinning out of control in the wake of their parents' sudden, unexpected divorce.

Title: 39. Straight Time
description: The difficulties of a career burglar to reinsert himself after being released on parole.

Title: 40. Comes a Horseman
description: A brave and proud woman struggles for her land, finding help and something more in unexpected way.

Title: 41. American Hot Wax
description: The story of the rise and fall of Alan Freed, the pioneering New York City radio disc jockey who was instrumental in introducing and popularizing rock 'n' roll music in the 1950s.

Title: 42. The Brink's Job
description: A fictional retelling of the infamous Boston Brink's Company robbery on January 17th, 1950, of $2.7M, which cost the American taxpayers $29M to apprehend the culprits, with only $58,000 recovered.

Title: 43. Goin' South
description: Due to the lack of men after the Civil War, a western town allows a young bachelorette who lives alone to save a thief from hanging by marrying him. They must deal with his old gang, the Sheriff, the railroad, a gold mine, and each other.

Title: 44. King of the Gypsies
description: In the criminal and violent world of modern-day Gypsies based in New York City, their 'king' Zharko Stepanowicz passes his leadership to his unwilling grandson, leaving the skipped father resentful.

Title: 45. Force 10 from Navarone
description: During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.

Title: 46. Paradise Alley
description: Three Italian-American brothers, living in the slums of 1940's New York City, try to help each other with one's wrestling career using one brother's promotional skills and another brother's con-artist tactics to thwart a sleazy manager.

Title: 47. The Bad News Bears Go to Japan
description: A small-time hustler takes the pint-sized baseball team to Japan for a match against the country's best Little League baseball team, sparking off a series of adventures and mishaps.

Title: 48. International Velvet
description: Velvet's orphaned niece Sarah follows her dream of Olympic glory with her horse Arizona Pie.

Title: 49. Blue Collar
description: When three automotive factory workers who're struggling financially try to steal from their own labor union, they discover corruption, and reluctantly decide to use this information for blackmail.

Title: 50. Pretty Baby
description: A preteen girl lives as a prostitute in New Orleans in 1917.

Title: 51. Gray Lady Down
description: A Navy Captain uses his experimental Snark to reach a nuclear submarine stuck on an ocean ledge.

Title: 52. Brass Target
description: In 1945, General Patton sends Germany's confiscated gold reserves to Frankfurt, but the Army train is robbed by plotters who also hire a Swiss hitman to kill the General.

Title: 53. Caravans
description: In 1948, at the U.S. embassy in Zadestan, a young diplomat is ordered to find the missing daughter of an influential U.S. Senator.

Title: 54. Days of Heaven
description: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.

Title: 55. Our Winning Season
description: The story follows three teenagers through their senior year of high school in the 1960s, focusing on the star athlete of the group.

Title: 56. I Wanna Hold Your Hand
description: In 1964, six teenagers from New Jersey run off to see The Beatles perform on The Ed Sullivan Show (1948) in the hope of meeting their idols. However, they don't have tickets. Along the way, they learn new things about friendship and growing up.

Title: 57. Skateboard
description: A Hollywood agent finds himself in debt to a powerful bookie. To make a fast buck, he creates a team of exceptionally talented skateboarders and enters them in a downhill race. If they win, they will get $20,000.

Title: 58. Five Days from Home
description: A man escapes from a Louisiana prison to be at the California hospital bedside of his ailing son.

Title: 59. Uncle Joe Shannon
description: Self-destructive after the deaths of his wife and child in a fire, a trumpet player befriends a crippled youngster and together they battle obstacles through each other's encouragement.

Title: 60. Killer of Sheep
description: Set in the Watts area of Los Angeles, a slaughterhouse worker must suspend his emotions to continue working at a job he finds repugnant, and then he finds he has little sensitivity for the family he works so hard to support.

Title: 61. The Last Waltz
description: A film account and presentation of the final concert of The Band.

Title: 62. Boarding School
description: This film tells the story about a group of girls at an exclusive German girls boarding school. Across the lake is an exclusive boys boarding school...

Title: 63. Nunzio
description: Protected by his brother, a mentally impaired Brooklynite pretends he's Superman and becomes a hero.

Title: 64. Nest of Vipers
description: A background of rising fascism in Venice in 1930s. A music-student, Matthias, mixes with the town's bourgeoisie and falls in love with a mature teacher, Carla, the mother of his friend Renato, and then with his young colleague, Elena.

Title: 65. Stunt Rock
description: Australia's top stuntman Grant Page travels to Hollywood to shoot a TV show while showing off his various dangerous stunts, interspersed with a rock band concert and other sketches.

Title: 66. Northern Lights
description: NORTHERN LIGHTS has the feel of an old black and white photograph discovered in an attic. The bitter-sweet story of young lovers caught up in an political struggle waged by farmers against the grain trade, the banks and the railroads, NORTHERN LIGHTS brings back a forgotten era of American history and evokes the austere beauty of the Northern Plains.

Title: 67. Despair
description: In early-1930s Berlin, an elegant Russian émigré and eccentric chocolatier convinces himself that he has seen his doppelgänger, and hatches a murderous plan to trade his existence for an entirely new one. Will he get over the deep despair?

Title: 68. Bloodbrothers
description: A young man is torn between following in his brothers' footsteps or striking out on his own.

Title: 69. The Green Room
description: A French little town, at the end of the twenties. Julien Davenne is a journalist whose wife Julie died a decade ago. He gathered in the green room all Julie's objects. When a fire destroys the room, he renovates a little chapel and devotes it to Julie and his other dead persons.

Title: 70. I Spit on Your Grave
description: An aspiring writer is repeatedly assaulted, humiliated, and left for dead by four men she systematically hunts down to seek revenge.

Title: 71. The Wild Geese
description: A British banker hires a former British Army colonel turned mercenary to parachute into Africa with his team and rescue a deposed president of a southern African nation from the hands of a corrupt dictator.

Title: 72. Faces of Death
description: A collection of death scenes, ranging from TV material to homemade super 8 movies.

Title: 73. Dawn of the Dead
description: During an escalating zombie epidemic, two Philadelphia SWAT team members, a traffic reporter and his TV executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.

Title: 74. Watership Down
description: Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.

Title: 75. Piranha
description: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

Title: 76. The Driver
description: A getaway driver becomes the latest assignment for a tenacious detective.

Title: 77. The Boys from Brazil
description: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

Title: 78. Little Lips
description: A writer returns home from World War I. He has developed a very bad case of post traumatic stress disorder. He contemplates suicide, but becomes interested in the 12 year old niece of the innkeeper at the place where he is recuperating.

Title: 79. Starcrash
description: An outlaw smuggler and her alien companion are recruited by the Emperor of the Galaxy to rescue his son and destroy a secret weapon by the evil Count Zarth Arn.

Title: 80. The Thirty Nine Steps
description: In March 1914, a mining engineer named Richard Hannay tries to prevent Prussian Agents from executing a political assassination designed to trigger World War I.

Title: 81. Coma
description: A young and ambitious female doctor's best friend falls into an unexplained coma after a routine medical procedure. Noticing an unusually high number of similar comas occurring in her hospital, she's determined to uncover the cause.

Title: 82. Game of Death
description: A martial arts movie star must fake his death to bring down the syndicate that is extorting him and other celebrities - including his pop singer girlfriend - for protection money.

Title: 83. The Inglorious Bastards
description: In 1944 France, a group of escaped American military prisoners en route to Switzerland volunteers to steal a German V2 rocket warhead for the Allies.

Title: 84. Slave of the Cannibal God
description: A woman is aided by her brother, a professor and an explorer as they search the jungles of New Guinea for her anthropologist husband, who vanished near a mountain that is said to be cursed.

Title: 85. Drunken Master
description: Wong Fei-Hung is a mischievous, yet righteous young man, but after a series of incidents, his frustrated father has him disciplined by a master of drunken martial arts.

Title: 86. Magic
description: A ventriloquist is at the mercy of his vicious dummy while he tries to renew a romance with his high school sweetheart.

Title: 87. Attack of the Killer Tomatoes!
description: A group of scientists band together to save the world from mutated killer tomatoes.

Title: 88. Stay as You Are
description: Stuck in a dysfunctional marriage, a middle-aged architect has a chance encounter with an alluring student and they start an affair. He wants to be loved; she needs a meaningful relationship. However--could he be her missing father?

Title: 89. Autumn Sonata
description: A devoted wife is visited by her mother, a successful concert pianist who had little time for her when she was young.

Title: 90. Ice Castles
description: An inexperienced yet naturally gifted ice skater makes a spectacular debut in the skating world before encountering an event that could possibly derail her hopes and dreams.

Title: 91. The Sister of Ursula
description: Still mourning the passing of their father, two Austrian sisters, Dagmar and Ursula, arrive at a luxurious Italian seaside hotel. At the same time, a mysterious killer starts murdering promiscuous women in the area.

Title: 92. The Fury
description: A former CIA agent uses the talents of a young psychic to help retrieve his telekinetic son from a shadowy secret government agency.

Title: 93. Deathsport
description: Futuristic Science Fiction about a sport to the death, using "destructocycles".

Title: 94. The Toolbox Murders
description: A ski-masked maniac kills apartment complex tenants with the contents of a toolbox.

Title: 95. The Swarm
description: Deadly African bees spread over Texas and kill thousands of people. Scientists led by Bradford Crane and Captain Helena Anderson try to find an antidote and destroy the swarm - against the advice of Army General Thalius Slater.

Title: 96. Battlestar Galactica
description: After the destruction of the Twelve Colonies of Mankind, the last major fighter carrier leads a makeshift fugitive fleet on a desperate search for the legendary planet Earth.

Title: 97. Fairy Tales
description: On his twenty-first birthday, the Prince goes on a quest that takes him across the land searching for the one woman that gets him sexually excited, Princess Sleeping Beauty.

Title: 98. Adventures of a Plumber's Mate
description: A horny plumber, Sid, enjoys a profession which offers him ample opportunity to bed sexy housewives.

Title: 99. The Big Sleep
description: A grizzled American private detective in England investigates a complicated case of blackmail-turned-murder involving a rich but honest elderly general, his two loose socialite daughters, a pornographer, and a gangster.

Title: 100. Behind Convent Walls
description: On the surface the women at the convent are your average nuns. However, what they get up to in their spare time is far from what you'd expect from nuns.

Title: 101. Felicity
description: Teenager Felicity studies at a remote Roman Catholic Church boarding school and seeks indulgence in popular erotic novels Story of O, Emmanuelle and in a lesbian love affair with her friend Jenny.

Title: 102. The Betsy
description: The aging, retired founder of an auto giant comes out of retirement to try to develop a safe, fuel-efficient car.

Title: 103. The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
description: A school student who conspires with his teacher and others to overthrow the Qing Dynasty sees his family slaughtered at the hands of his enemies. He joins the Shaolin Temple and rigorously studies martial arts to avenge his beloved ones.

Title: 104. The Silent Partner
description: A timid bank teller anticipates a bank robbery and steals the money himself before the crook arrives. When the sadistic crook realizes he's been fooled, he tracks down the teller and engages him in a cat-and-mouse chase for the cash.

Title: 105. Who'll Stop the Rain
description: A Vietnam veteran involves his Wife and a war buddy in the dangerous world of drug smuggling.

Title: 106. An Unmarried Woman
description: A Manhattan woman struggles with her identity as she tries to move on from a painful divorce.

Title: 107. Good Guys Wear Black
description: An ex-US Army commando must find the reason why his comrades from his unit are being systematically murdered before he is next.

Title: 108. Thank God It's Friday
description: A Friday in the life of the disco club The Zoo, where the staff and clients meet and dance their lives away.

Title: 109. California Suite
description: Misadventures of four groups of guests at the Beverly Hills Hotel.

Title: 110. You Are Not Alone
description: Two precocious boys explore their sexuality at boarding school.

Title: 111. Girlfriends
description: A photographer and her girlfriend are roommates. She is stuck with small-change shooting jobs and dreams of success. When her roommate decides to get married and leave, she feels hurt and has to learn how to deal with living alone.

Title: 112. The Cheap Detective
description: San Francisco, 1940, detectives, dames, documents, Nazis, and a treasure.

Title: 113. The Cat from Outer Space
description: Three scientists help an Alien feline, stranded on Earth, to repair its damaged spacecraft in order to return home but their efforts are hampered by inept army officials and foreign spies.

Title: 114. Big Wednesday
description: Character study about the lives of some California surfers from the early 1960s to the 1970s as the Vietnam War interrupts their carefree life.

Title: 115. Jubilee
description: Queen Elizabeth I travels 400 years into the future to witness the appalling revelation of a dystopian London overrun by corruption and a vicious gang of punk guerrilla girls led by the new Monarch of Punk.

Title: 116. The Playbirds
description: Two detectives are drawn into the world of porn, while investigating murders of centrefolds...

Title: 117. The Bermuda Triangle
description: The passengers and crew of a ship on a scuba diving trip in the Caribbean stray into the famed Bermuda Triangle, and mysterious and deadly things start happening.

Title: 118. Strawberry Time
description: Jagoda Kopriva is a typical teenage girl who hangs out with her friends from school, flirting with boys, quarreling with her parents, and discovering her own sexuality.

Title: 119. Fedora
description: Down-on-his-luck Hollywood producer Barry 'Dutch' Detweiler attempts to lure Fedora, a famous but reclusive film actress, out of retirement only to discover the horrible truth behind her success.

Title: 120. The Boys in Company C
description: In 1967, five young men undergo boot camp training before being shipped out to Vietnam. Once they get there, the experience proves worse than they could have imagined.

Title: 121. Beauty and the Beast
description: In this gothic rendition of the classic fairy tale, a merchant's youngest daughter is held prisoner by a mysterious winged beast.

Title: 122. The Stud
description: Fontaine Khaled is the wife of a wealthy but boring businessman. She spends his money on her nightclub, the hobo, and partying.

Title: 123. Satyam Shivam Sundaram: Love Sublime
description: Rupa (Zeenat Aman) grew up being cursed as "unlucky" in her birth village. Her mother died during childbirth, then a kitchen accident leaves half her face disfigured. This is an artistic exploration of beauty and disfigurement, society's values, and, more importantly how a girl, teenager, and bride was treated during the times. Rajeev (Shashi Kapoor), the stereotype male engineer, falls in love with Rupa, who has a divine singing voice and the unscarred left cheek. When he sees the scarred cheek after marriage, he heads off into a tizzy and continues nightly dalliance with his mistress--the beautiful cheek. Little does he realize that his wife and mistress are two faces of the same person.

Title: 124. Snake in the Eagle's Shadow
description: An orphan who has been raised at a kung fu school, where he is treated as little more than a dogsbody and practice target for the students, has a life-changing experience after helping an old peripatetic beggar.

Title: 125. Empire of Passion
description: A married woman and her lover murder her husband and dump his body into a well, but his ghost returns to haunt them as the local gossip intensifies.

Title: 126. Lemon Popsicle
description: Three friends live their lives in 1950s Israel, each looking for someone to love.

Title: 127. Laserblast
description: A teenager stumbles upon an alien weapon, which transforms him into a grotesque killer.

Title: 128. Nathalie: Escape from Hell
description: A Russian doctor finds herself imprisoned in a lavish and elegant bordello for the high-ranking Nazi officers, at the mercy of a fiendish SS officer. Can she locate a missing British agent under her nose, and escape from hell?

Title: 129. The Shout
description: A traveller by the name of Crossley forces himself upon a musician and his wife in a lonely part of Devon, and uses the aboriginal magic he has learned to displace his host.

Title: 130. The Tree of Wooden Clogs
description: Peasant life in a feudal farm in rural Italy at the end of the 19th century.

Title: 131. The Manitou
description: A psychic's girlfriend finds out that a lump on her back is a growing reincarnation of a 400-year-old demonic Native American spirit.

Title: 132. Emanuelle and the White Slave Trade
description: An interview with a mobster propels newswoman Emanuelle into an undercover investigation of the seedy world of white slavery and the infamous mansion of Madame Claude.

Title: 133. Carnal Campus
description: The framework action is this time the editorial meeting of a school newspaper. In five episodes, the film describes how school-age young women in search for (physical) love in precarious situations.

Title: 134. Mardi Gras Massacre
description: Police try to capture someone who is commiting ritual murders of women during Mardi Gras in New Orleans.

Title: 135. Patrick
description: A young nurse who's just started working at a public clinic begins to suspect that a comatose young man may possess the powers of psychokinesis.

Title: 136. Go Tell the Spartans
description: During the early 1960s, U.S. military advisers in South Vietnam discover the same challenges that plagued the French army in Indochina ten years prior.

Title: 137. The Evil
description: A doctor buys a Civil War era dilapidated mansion, and hires a few friends to fix it up, but the mansion hides a deadly secret.

Title: 138. Rings of Fear
description: A detective investigating the murder of a teenage girl begins to focus his suspicions on the three girlfriends of the victim, who call themselves "The Inseparables."

Title: 139. Circle of Iron
description: A young martial artist embarks on an adventure, encountering other martial artists in battle until one day he meets an aging blind man who will show him the true meaning of martial arts and life.

Title: 140. China 9, Liberty 37
description: The railroad hires a condemned killer to murder an uncooperative rancher but the assassin fails to deliver, prompting the railroad men to go after him instead.

Title: 141. Meetings with Anna
description: Director Anna traverses Europe for film events, encountering strangers, family, and a Polish Jewish refugee friend, listening to their personal stories. The aftermath of war persists throughout her journey across the continent.

Title: 142. The Grapes of Death
description: A young woman discovers that the pesticide being sprayed on vineyards is turning people into killer zombies.

Title: 143. Vampire Hookers
description: Carradine is an aged vampire who has a bevy of vampiric beauties who lure many of their customers back to his lair. A pair of virile young Navy sailors get mixed up in their shenanigans.

Title: 144. Escape from Women's Prison
description: Four female convicts escape from prison and take a bus full of young female athletes hostage, and take refuge in a judge's house. Soon enough, the police surrounds the place, but the escapees are not giving up without a fight.

Title: 145. Five Deadly Venoms
description: The sixth and final disciple of a dying martial arts master is instructed to find the master's five former disciples, each specializing in their own unique kung fu style, and defeat any evil ones amongst them.

Title: 146. Carry on Emmannuelle
description: Emmanuelle Prevert struggles with an uninterested husband. She pursues affairs with influential men. A jealous lover exposes her infidelities, causing a scandal. Her goal remains igniting passion with her spouse.

Title: 147. A Wedding
description: The daughter of a Louisville truck driver marries the scion of a very wealthy family, but the reception at the family estate is boycotted by the invited guests.

Title: 148. Rosie Dixon - Night Nurse
description: Young Rosie Dixon starts her nurse training at Queen Adelaide's Hospital, but the student doctors and randy male patients just can't keep their hands off her.

Title: 149. The Medusa Touch
description: A telekinetic novelist causes disasters simply by thinking about them.

Title: 150. Rape of Love
description: Nicole, nurse in Grenoble, is raped one night by four men. Deeply scarred, emotionally and physically, she thinks she will never recover from the trauma. Following a friend's advice, she decides to file a lawsuit.

Title: 151. The Coming of Sin
description: Superstitious young gypsy servant hired by solitary female artist experiences recurring nightmares of a naked horseman assaulting her after moving into artist's country chateau.

Title: 152. Warlords of the Deep
description: Two deep-sea explorers and their crew must survive a master race of beings and monstrous creatures when they discover the fabled city of Atlantis.

Title: 153. Hotel Fear
description: A mother and her daughter run a hotel during the late stages of WWII. The mother suddenly dies, and the daughter finds herself alone with her sleazy guests.

Title: 154. Helga, la louve de Stilberg
description: Helga moves the action to South America, where she lords over a castle of female political prisoners, who are stripped and tortured at whim.

Title: 155. The Alien Factor
description: A science ship with three dangerous specimens collected from around the universe crash lands on Earth. A mysterious stranger named "Ben Zachary" shows up claiming to be able to save the day. Can he do what he claims?

Title: 156. Youngblood
description: A gang war/drug story set in a Los Angeles ghetto about the coming of age of a 15-year-old black youth.

Title: 157. Long Weekend
description: When a suburban couple go camping for the weekend at a remote beach, they discover that nature isn't in an accommodating mood.

Title: 158. Killer's Moon
description: Four mental patients - who, due to unauthorized experiments, believe they're living in a dream and have shed all moral imperatives - escape and find their way to the nearest bus-load of stranded schoolgirls.

Title: 159. In a Year with 13 Moons
description: A transgender woman tries to salvage something from the wreckage love has made of her life by confronting her anguished past, hoping to find ultimate acceptance among former acquaintances and herself.

Title: 160. Who Is Killing the Great Chefs of Europe?
description: European chefs are being killed in the same ways that their special dishes are prepared. Pastry chef Natasha O'Brien is suspected, as is her ex-husband Robby Ross, a fast-food franchiser looking for chefs to endorse his omelet shops.

Title: 161. FM
description: When a liberal music station's owners decide to introduce army recruitment ads, despite the protests of its manager, the rebellious DJs are determined to fight back, no matter the cost.

Title: 162. Get Out Your Handkerchiefs
description: A worried husband finds a lover for his depressed wife, but she falls in love with a bullied thirteen-year-old math prodigy and wants to have the boy's baby.

Title: 163. Violette
description: In an interwar France struggling with profound social and political change, 18-year-old Violette Noziere rebels against the constraints of her claustrophobic, working-class (and possibly incestuous) family, with troubling consequences.

Title: 164. Gates of Heaven
description: A documentary about a pet cemetery in California, and the people who have pets buried there.

Title: 165. The Pyjama Girl Case
description: In Australia, a retired police inspector is called to duty to solve the murder case of a young woman whose partially-burned body has been found on the beach.

Title: 166. Wicked Women
description: Margarita, the only witness of a brutal murder, has temporary amnesia due to shock. She's sent to a psychiatric clinic where a masked man rapes her and kills another woman. She must piece her memory back together before he returns.

Title: 167. High-Ballin'
description: Two truck drivers fight off thugs who have been hired to drive them out of business.

Title: 168. Muqaddar Ka Sikandar
description: When a homeless and orphaned young man finds work in the house of a wealthy man, he falls in love with the daughter of that wealthy man. But things start to change a lot thereafter.

Title: 169. Cat in the Cage
description: Rich man's son returns home after mental hospital stay. Discovers father married late wife's nurse, who conspires with chauffeur lover to kill father for inheritance. Conflict ensues over wealth, deception, and family dynamics.

Title: 170. Satan's Blood
description: A young couple are tricked into going into a sinister house where a coven of devil-worshipers waits for them.

Title: 171. Message from Space
description: An embattled planet, which is on the edge of doom, sends an S.O.S. and an intergalactic team comes to its rescue.

Title: 172. The Bees
description: When South America killer bees corporately smuggled into the United States mutate into intelligent insects and attacks helpless people, young scientists work desperately to end the threat as the menace swarms in on the city areas.

Title: 173. Cock Crows at Eleven
description: Federico, a criminal on the run, forms an inappropriate relationship with 12-year-old Simona. Her mother Vera conspires with Federico to murder Simona's disabled father, straining Federico's bond with Simona.

Title: 174. Harper Valley P.T.A.
description: A carefree single mother challenges the local PTA after they threaten to expel her daughter from school, due to her lifestyle.

Title: 175. To Be Twenty
description: Lia and Tina are two beautiful girls who meet and realize that they have a lot in common. They are both young, beautiful and pissed off, so they decide to hitchhike their way to Rome to find Nazariota's commune, a place to stay for free and have all the sex they want... or so they think. Things don't go as they have planned though, and soon they become involved in prostitution, the police and an aggressive gang.

Title: 176. Just a Gigolo
description: After World War I, a war hero returns to Berlin to find that there's no place for him--he has no skills other than what he learned in the army, and can only find menial, low-paying jobs. He decides to become a gigolo to lonely rich women.

Title: 177. Avalanche
description: The vacationers at a winter wonderland struggle to survive after an avalanche of snow crashes into their ski resort. Their holiday then turns into a game of survival.

Title: 178. The Bloodstained Shadow
description: The body of a schoolgirl is found in a meadow. The murderer is never caught, and years later, a young man named Stefano returns to the island and is reunited with his brother, the local priest.

Title: 179. The House of the Dead
description: "The House of the Dead" is a 1978 horror anthology movie with "The Mortician" introducing each scary tale.

Title: 180. On the Yard
description: In prison, one prisoner buys some smokes from another. Then he admits he can't pay for it and becomes indebted to him and the interest is rising daily.

Title: 181. Malibu Beach
description: School's out and it's time for a summer of fun, mischief and love for various characters on Malibu Beach.

Title: 182. Women in Cellblock 9
description: Somewhere in the jungles of South America mercenaries stop a truck which has allegedly loaded fruit. The cargo turns out to be six young women. Apprehended and handed over to the custody of the local women's prison.

Title: 183. The Seniors
description: Four students open a bogus sex clinic for cheap thrills and then are amazed to see it blossom into a profitable business.

Title: 184. Triangle of Venus
description: A wealthy matriarch keeps a close eye on the complicated and often erotic lives of her children and relatives.

Title: 185. An Enemy of the People
description: A scientist stands against an entire town when he discovers their medicinal spa is polluted.

Title: 186. Don
description: Don, a wanted criminal, dies in a police chase. DSP D'Silva is the only one who knows about his death, and to get hold of the gang he trains Don-lookalike Vijay. But Vijay faces danger from the police and from within the gang.

Title: 187. The Mafu Cage
description: Ellen, a successful astronomer, cares for her mentally-ill sister, Cissy, who keeps a variety of primates in the home they inherited from their anthropologist father. When Ellen begins a romance, Cissy's jealousy proves deadly.

Title: 188. First Love
description: Ugo Cremonesi, left without work and awaiting liquidation, leaves the world of the vaudeville momentarily and takes refuge in Villa Serena, a shelter for old artists.

Title: 189. The Fifth Floor
description: College disco dancer is wrongly committed to an insane asylum.

Title: 190. Papaya: Love Goddess of the Cannibals
description: A team of geologists attempt to remove a native cannibal population from an island to perform atomic research, but the cannibals' female leader disposes of them one by one by seduction.

Title: 191. Renaldo and Clara
description: Bob Dylan on tour with the Rolling Thunder Revue in 1975; concert footage, documentary interviews and bizarre improvised character scenes.

Title: 192. The Highschool Girl Repeating Class
description: Angela is a beautiful girl and despite her boyfriend Tonino is not exactly an Adonis, she insists to be faithful to him. But when discovers that she had been repeatedly betrayed, she decides to take revenge.

Title: 193. Spiritual Kung Fu
description: A goofy student is taught a lost martial art style by five ghosts.

Title: 194. Terror
description: The descendants of a witch hunting family and their close friends are stalked and killed by a mysterious entity.

Title: 195. The Norseman
description: An eleventh century Viking Prince sails to America to find his father, who on a previous voyage had been captured by Indians.

Title: 196. Seven Freckles
description: A well-made, enjoyable, East German coming-of-age film. Cunningly weaving Shakespeare's play 'Romeo and Juliet' into its plot. All set in a summer vacation camp.

Title: 197. Fingers
description: A dysfunctional young man is pulled between loyalties to his Italian mob-connected loan-shark father and his mentally-disturbed Jewish concert-pianist mother.

Title: 198. It Lives Again
description: An epidemic of monster babies sweeps across America.

Title: 199. The Water Babies
description: This children's fantasy tells the story of a 12-year-old boy who discovers a complex underwater world where young children are held prisoner by an evil shark and an eel.

Title: 200. Alice in Spanish Wonderland
description: Based on the story Alice in Wonderland, Alicia has fallen asleep on a summer afternoon on the bank of a river. When she thinks she awakens, she meets an erotic black bunny in the shape of a woman who catches her attention.

Title: 201. Crippled Avengers
description: Three men who have been physically disabled by a vindictive martial arts master and his physically-disabled son ally together and learn kung fu from an elderly martial-artist and his mentally-disabled pupil, so they can avenge themselves.

Title: 202. Stingray
description: Lonigan and his partner Tony, two drug dealers, shoot two cops who attempt to set them up, and run away with a million bucks and the drugs, which they stash in a red Corvette Stingray in a used car lot. When they attempt to recover their stash with their leader, Abigail, they find out that two happy-go-lucky dudes, Elmo and Al, have bought the car. They quickly pursue the two along with the police who think that the car's new owners are the criminals.

Title: 203. The Schoolteacher Goes to Boys' High
description: Edwige Fenech stars in this Italian sex-comedy as the new teacher in all-boys Catholic school. All of the boys desire for the chance to "learn" more about their new teacher, but only 1 student gets the opportunity.

Title: 204. The Priest
description: Obsessed with fantasies of sex, Father Miguel seeks professional help through his church but they are not listening; thus leaving the Father in a dilemma; leaving the church or should he try, on his own, to surrender to these temptations?

Title: 205. Jennifer
description: Ostracized at a snooty private school because of her impoverished rural Virginia background, scholarship student Jennifer Baylor is tormented to the point of exacting revenge by using her psychic control over snakes.

Title: 206. The Adventures of Picasso
description: A farcical biopic about Pablo Picasso, from his early years, to his middle years, to the years right before his death, and some of the years before and in-between that.

Title: 207. Snake and Crane Arts of Shaolin
description: A martial arts book, which Hsu Yin-Fung carries, is being highly sought by various clans and gangs, but he is in pursuit of someone himself.

Title: 208. A Simple Story
description: A simple story about simple people. A 38 year old divorced woman (Marie), who now has a lover (Serge) but decides to leave him, abort his baby, and then returns with her ex-husband (Georges). Their daily life and of their friends, who have the same typical problems.

Title: 209. Sweater Girls
description: A group of teenage girls forms a club, The Sweater Girls, to preserve their virginity.

Title: 210. Remember My Name
description: Just released from prison, a young woman arrives in town to "start a new life", but soon begins stalking a married construction worker for no apparent reason, turning his life inside out and eventually terrorizing him and his wife.

Title: 211. The Hound of the Baskervilles
description: A Sherlock Holmes spoof about a family that has been haunted for years by the curse of a horrible hound.

Title: 212. Emanuelle and the Porno Nights of the World
description: Emanuelle hosts a Mondo film look into bizarre and perverse sexual encounters, fantasies, and rituals from around the world.

Title: 213. Yagyu Clan Conspiracy
description: After the Tokugawa shogun's death by poisoning, his sons Iemitsu and Tadanaga compete for the shogunate, dividing the land into warring factions. Iemitsu's mentor, betrays all to secure Iemitsu's power, leading to widespread conflict.

Title: 214. Deseo carnal
description: A young man travels to Amsterdam and gets involved in a prostitution network of underage boys.

Title: 215. Ringing Bell
description: An innocent lamb learns about life and death when he seeks revenge upon the wolf who slaughtered his mother.

Title: 216. A Different Story
description: A homosexual woman marries a gay male friend to prevent his deportation, but they soon fall in love.

Title: 217. Trishul
description: An engineer visiting a town, has a brief affair with a local girl and walks off, leaving her with a child. The son grows up to avenge his deserted mother. Vijay is the angry young man playing the son.

Title: 218. The Comeback
description: A singer holes up at a sinister estate to write new songs for his act. The ghost of his murdered wife begins to haunt him, then the person who actually killed her shows up at the mansion.

Title: 219. Zero to Sixty
description: A divorced man hooks up with a street-smart 16-year-old who makes her living by repossessing cars from their owners.

Title: 220. The War of the Robots
description: An alien civilization, which facing eminent extinction, kidnaps two famous genetic scientists from Earth. A troop of soldiers is dispatched to combat the humanoid robots and rescue the victims.

Title: 221. Occupation in 26 Pictures
description: Three young men - a Croat, an Italian, and a Jew - are the best of friends in pre-World War II Dubrovnik. When their country is occupied by Germans and their cronies, the idyllic city becomes a place of terror and gruesome massacres. The friends must now take different sides in a global conflict.

Title: 222. Always for Pleasure
description: New Orleans spirit shown through traditions: funerals turn celebratory, seafood at local spots, street festivals, Mardi Gras prep rooted in slave history, Wild Tchoupitoulas honor Native Americans, ending with St. Joseph's parade.

Title: 223. Main Tulsi Tere Aangan Ki
description: A woman raises the illegitimate son of her husband along with her own, treating them both equally. But her decision to hand over the property matters to the illegitimate son is met with hostility by her own revenge-minded son.

Title: 224. The Dawn Rapists
description: A gang of four out of control adolescent ruffians egg each other on, to take hostage, torture, and brutally rape several girls, whilst on the run from the law.

Title: 225. Movie Movie
description: Three movie genres of the 1930s--boxing films, World War I aviation dramas, and backstage Broadway musicals--are satirized using the same cast.

Title: 226. The ABC of Love and Sex: Australia Style
description: A tongue-in-cheek sex education documentary covering a different subject for each letter of the alphabet, e.g. A is for Anatomy, B is for Babies, etc.

Title: 227. Bosko Buha
description: After losing their families in WW2, young children decide to join the Partizans. At first, they want to get rid of them, but later they join their ranks with Bosko Buha becoming a legend because of his skill in destroying enemy bunkers.

Title: 228. Rockers
description: Horsemouth sets himself up in business selling records but when gangsters steal his bike things start to turn nasty. As tensions build, Horsemouth and friends plot to end the gangsters reign of terror and restore justice to the people of Kingston.

Title: 229. The Chant of Jimmie Blacksmith
description: After suffering racist abuse throughout his life - which intensifies following his marriage to a white woman - a half-Aboriginal farmhand finds himself driven to murder.

Title: 230. A Man for Sale
description: A teenage girl falls in love with a man who works in live sex shows, and who just happens to be having an affair with the girl's stepmother--with her father's knowledge.

Title: 231. Triangle of Lust
description: A beautiful young girl parachutes onto a remote, isolated island, and finds herself taken prisoner by a gang of criminals hiding out there.

Title: 232. French Fried Vacation
description: Holidaymakers arriving in a Club Med camp on the Ivory Coast are determined to forget their everyday problems and emotional disappointments. Games, competitions, outings, bathing and sunburn accompany a continual succession of casual affairs.

Title: 233. Coach
description: A town hires an Olympic track star named Randy Rawlings to coach the high school basketball team. Randy is hired sight unseen and the town does not know Randy is a woman. The town immediately tries to force her out as soon as she arrives.

Title: 234. Absolution
description: At a boarding school in England, students Benjie Stanfield and Arthur Dyson endeavor to drive their strict Roman Catholic priest Father Goddard mad with their confessed sins.

Title: 235. Let's Get Laid
description: A soldier returning from World War II gets mixed up in a series of murders and mistaken identies regarding a cigarette lighter than affects all electric power.

Title: 236. Rape and Death of a Housewife
description: 3 young boys drunkenly rape a woman named Emiko, the wife of a man they've developed a friendship with. She dies of heart failure during the attack.Her chicken farmer husband, incapable of dealing with her death tends to her corpse as though it were still alive completely unable to accept her demise.

Title: 237. Spawn of the Slithis
description: A nuclear leak creates a mutant Slithis sea monster, which terrorizes the variety of pets, winos, and hippies who hang around Venice, California.

Title: 238. Hot Lead and Cold Feet
description: This saga of the old west involves twin brothers who compete for possession of a rickety cow town founded by their father while a crooked Mayor tries to put an end to the competitors so he can inherit the town himself.

Title: 239. L'argent des autres
description: A bank employee tries to clear his name after he is unfairly fired.

Title: 240. A Night Full of Rain
description: A communist journalist and an American liberal photographer try to cohabit with their different perspectives of love and life.

Title: 241. Liebesgrüße aus der Lederhose 4: Die versaute Hochzeitsnacht
description: Two railway officials buy an old railway in Kleinbach and starts to transport tourists. Their services include champagne, dancing and sex.

Title: 242. Odds and Evens
description: A Navy detective enlists his brother, a former gambler, to help him liquidate an illegal gaming house on a yacht near Miami.

Title: 243. Lo chiamavano Bulldozer
description: After his fishing boat is "periscoped", ex US footballer Bulldozer docks in an Italian port, where local criminals and American soldiers fight each other. Locals discover Bulldozer's talents and challenge the Yanks to a football game.

Title: 244. Adela Has Not Had Supper Yet
description: When the famous detective Nick Carter visits Prague, he becomes involved in strange case of a missing dog and even stranger carnivorous plant. He becomes convinced that he is standing against his greatest enemy - the Gardener, who supposedly died years ago in a swamp...

Title: 245. 80 huszár
description: A group of Hussars stationed at a Polish outpost hear there's a revolution going on in their native Hungary. Their attempt to return home incurs the wrath of the Austrians.

Title: 246. Heroes of the East
description: A Chinese man marries a Japanese martial artist, and they begin to bicker over which country has the better martial arts. It reaches a point where he has to go against Japanese martial artists in different styles to prove who's the best.

Title: 247. Coming Attractions
description: Broad satire and buffoonery presented as a series of movie trailers. Among the titles and subjects are: "The Howard Huge Story", "Skate-boarders from Hell", "The Invasion of the Penis Snatchers", Woody Allen (pre-Mia), movie trailer come-ons, Charlie Chaplin, war movies, Billy Jack. The source of the title is presented about an hour into the film.

Title: 248. French Quarter
description: Chronicles the life of a young New Orleans prostitute and her co-workers.

Title: 249. A Dama do Lotação
description: Carlos and Solange, childhood sweethearts, marry after a chaste courtship. On their wedding night, Solange refuses to make love to him. First he pleads, then in anger he rapes her. She says she adores him, but, even after months of marriage, can't endure his touch. To prove to herself she's not frigid, she begins a daily routine of seducing strangers on public busses; she also takes Carlos's best friend to a motel. Carlos figures out that she's unfaithful and, armed, confronts Solange. Meanwhile, she seeks psychiatric help because she feels no remorse. Will there be violence and death, a psychological breakthrough, or more bus rides?

Title: 250. Teen Lust
description: Two sexy young women move into a sleepy suburb and before long, every man in the vicinity falls for their charms.

Title: 251. Blood Relatives
description: Homicide detective Steve Carella is trying to solve the brutal murder of 17-year-old Muriel Stark. Her younger cousin Patricia, who saw the killer and barely escaped with her life, helps him. However, the case soon takes a bizarre turn.

Title: 252. Viol, la grande peur
description: Newspaper reporters recount various rape cases from around the world and the victims' mistreatment by the judicial system, including the story of one victim (Brigitte Lahaie) whom got revenge her own way.

Title: 253. In Praise of Older Women
description: Andras Vajda grows up in a turbulent, war-torn Hungary, where he procures local girls for the occupying G.I.'s during World War II. Disappointed by girls of his age, he meets Maya, a married women in her thirties, who tutors him in the lessons of love and romance. Maya is only the first of many mature women that Andras will meet through his teenage and young adult life.

Title: 254. Shalimar
description: Sir John Locksley, the greatest jewel thief, decides his most prized possession, the Shalimar Ruby, should be passed on to a worthy successor. He invites the best rival jewel thieves to his island estate to participate in a deadly contest.

Title: 255. Rabbit Test
description: Lionel's life turns around after a one-night stand on top of a pinball table... he becomes the world's first pregnant man!

Title: 256. Oliver's Story
description: In this sequel to Love Story (1970), grieving Oliver is being pressured by his in-laws to move on and take part in the family business. He meets a pretty heiress and they start dating, but memories of Jennie come rushing back.

Title: 257. Killer's Delight
description: A detective tracks a serial killer through San Francisco.

Title: 258. Popcorn und Himbeereis
description: On the way to cash a check for her boss, Vivi run into her friend Bea who has two dates at the same time. Asked to take over one of the dates Vivi accepts, but it means a great deal of complications.

Title: 259. Las que empiezan a los quince años
description: Elvira, a young woman whose life is full of difficulties and whose family relationships are very problematic, decides to enter the world of prostitution. Some friends of the same age will facilitate the way.

Title: 260. Sunset Cove
description: Teenagers band together to keep their beach from being bulldozed to build condominiums.

Title: 261. A Distant Thunder
description: This second film of four, "A Distant Thunder", continues the story of Patty, a young woman living in the "end times" of biblical prophecy, begun in the first film of the series, entitled "A Thief in the Night".This second film finds Patty living as a fugitive, trying to hide from the ever-increasing evil around her. Relentlessly pursued and finally captured by the forces of UNITE, she is given a choice: Either receive "the mark" or face death.

Title: 262. The Avenging Eagle
description: Chi Ming-sing is a former disciple of a gang run by overlord Yoh Xi-hung. Yoh's disciples hunt Chi relentlessly as he travels on a soul-searching journey. He comes to the aid of a seemingly bumbling man who hardly takes even life-threatening scenes seriously. The man Chi saved starts following him on the road, explaining that he's looking for someone who committed a grievous, unforgivable wrong. As the two travel on the road, it starts to become clear that Chi's companion is more than he seems: he's actually a very skilled martial artist, and his boots contain short blades that he can attach to his sleeves. Chi finally tells his companion his story: he's seeking out a renowned swordsman named Cheuk Yi-fan... not to kill him, but to die at his hand. Chi is haunted of the last job he did with the gang, slaughtering many of Cheuk's family and friends... and Chi himself slew Cheuk's pregnant wife. Chi's companion agrees to help Chi with his mission. But when the two arrive at Yoh's stronghold intent on killing him, Yoh recognizes Chi's companion as none other than Cheuk Yi-fan himself. Will Chi and Cheuk be able to remain together against Yoh's formidable fighting style, or will Yoh succeed at dividing and conquering his foes?

Title: 263. Lupin the 3rd: The Mystery of Mamo
description: While attempting to win the affections of a beautiful rival, a master thief risks death to learn the secret intentions of a wealthy and seemingly immortal, but certainly ruthless, recluse.

Title: 264. La zizanie
description: Guillaume has made it: A machine that can clean dirty air by simply sucking all dirt into air balloons and then shipping them far far away so his explanation. Some Japanese business guys, after dinner with a lot of alcohol, order 5,000 pieces. His only problem: His production capacity is way to small so he gets to produce the machines in his private house. His wife Bernadette is far from being happy about it. Her private life goes down the line so she decides to leave Guillaume and to finally have revenge she candidates for major against her husband...

Title: 265. The Frenchman's Garden
description: At the beginning of the twentieth century in Spain, a brothel owner and his partner lure rich men to their property, kill them and steal their money.

Title: 266. Trauma
description: A writer arrives to an isolated boardinghouse run by a beautiful but strange woman. Shortly after his arrival, guests start to get violently killed.

Title: 267. Matilda
description: A small-time talent agent discovers an amazing boxing kangaroo and figures to use it as his stepping-stone into the big time.

Title: 268. Sultan
description: Portrayal of a young depressed Turkish widow in the slums whose infinite dignity alone looks after her orphan kids is depicted by the son of the town sheriff, who is in love with her.

Title: 269. Death Dimension
description: The Pig has a plan to eradicate some people with a freeze bomb that instantly freezes people to death. It is up to Detective Ash to stop him and protect the woman with the secret to the ice bomb embedded in a microdot under the skin of her forehead.

Title: 270. Almost Summer
description: A high school student body presidential race gets nasty when the expected winner, beautiful and popular Christine, is challenged by an unknown candidate, Darryl, carefully chosen and managed by Christine's Machiavelian ex-boyfriend.

Title: 271. The Place Without Limits
description: Family honor, greed, machismo, homophobia, and the dreams of whores collide in a Mexican town. Rich, elderly Don Alejo is poised to sell the town for a profit, needing only to buy a whorehouse to own all the buildings and close the deal. It's owned by a man and his daughter: Manuelita is gay, aging, afraid; he cross-dresses and entertains as a flamenco dancer; he wants to sell and leave. His daughter wants to stay. The return of Pancho complicates things: he's a hothead Alejo tries to control and he scared Manuelita the year before. Things come to a head as Pancho breaks Alejo's hold on him, then flirts and dances with Manuelita and finds himself at risk of being called a "maricón".

Title: 272. Blood Feud
description: In pre-World War II Sicily, just as the fascists come to power, two men fall in love with the same woman. The changes in their country's politics ultimately take all three on a journey across the ocean to New York City.

Title: 273. Enter the Game of Death
description: WWII looms, China fears German/Japanese invasion. Espionage group hires Bruce Le to retrieve secret document from 6-floor tower's top level by fighting his way up.

Title: 274. Starhops
description: Three carhops try to help save a failing drive-in restaurant.

Title: 275. Oi tembelides tis eforis koiladas
description: A father moves with his three sons and their beautiful, hard working servant in a big, old house in the countryside, where a weird drowsiness seems to occupy the four men. Will it be possible for one of them to break free?

Title: 276. Little Girl in Blue Velvet
description: An old surgeon falls in love with an intellectual underage girl.

Title: 277. Bilbao
description: A disturbed middle-aged man is obsessed by a dancer and prostitute and abducts her, with tragic consequences.

Title: 278. Legacy of Blood
description: Horror movie about three wicked sisters and their equally unsavory husbands who all arrive at a remote inn where they mean to attend the reading of their uncle's will. One by one, the heirs are dispatched by an unknown killer.

Title: 279. Savana - Sesso e diamanti
description: The film about diamonds contraband in one South American country.

Title: 280. Perceval le Gallois
description: The exploits of Sir Perceval, a legendary exemplar of knightly chivalry and one of the champions of King Arthur's Round Table.

Title: 281. Confessions of a Congressman
description: Forbidden love between a politician and a teenage hustler hired by secret police for blackmail. Their relationship takes an unexpected romantic turn, leading to a dangerous situation involving betrayal and potential murder.

Title: 282. Lucky Luke: Ballad of the Daltons
description: A wandering cowboy watches over formidable bandits who, to touch an inheritance, must eliminate the members of the jury who sentenced their uncle.

Title: 283. The Further Adventures of the Wilderness Family
description: The Wilderness Family battles fierce winter storms, an avalanche, and a ferocious pack of hungry wolves while standing strong together to prove that the best things in life are free.

Title: 284. Barracuda
description: Little coastal town is being terrorized by deadly Barracudas.

Title: 286. The Cat and the Canary
description: A group of potential heirs gather in a forbidding old house to learn which of them will inherit a fortune. Later, they learn that a flesh-rending maniac is loose.

Title: 287. Somebody Killed Her Husband
description: A woman's husband is murdered and she and her lover must find the killer or stand accused of doing it themselves.

Title: 288. The Redeemer: Son of Satan!
description: Six people are trapped within the confines of their old high school during their 10th high school reunion with a psychotic, masked preacher who kills them off for their sinful lives they have made for themselves.

Title: 289. Emanuelle e Lolita
description: Another story about the adventures of a woman by the name of Emmanuel in exotic countries. This time in Sri Lanka, where young local lolita falls in love with luxurious white lady, causing the something like the parent and not only the feelings. But her friend was not against to have fun with a young aborigen.

Title: 290. Vil du se min smukke navle?
description: Amidst a bunch of kids from a 9th grade class from Denmark which goes on a school trip to Sweden having a lot of experiences , the story surrounds Claus and Lene, which meet the first real feelings of love.

Title: 291. The Lucifer Complex
description: An intelligence agent discovers a Nazi plot to revive the Third Reich by using clones.

Title: 292. Knock-Out Cop
description: Commissary Rizzo in Napoli gets a message from a policeman from South Africa who wants to meet him. Immediatlz before this meeting the south African policeman is killed. Dying he shows Rizzo a picture of his little son Bodo. Riyyo travels to Johannesburg to find out what the policeman was working on and to find Bodo.

Title: 293. The Last Romantic Lover
description: The editor-in-chief of a New York women's magazine is organizing the "Last Romantic Lover" contest to find out if men still have a sense of romance.

Title: 294. Cheerleaders Beach Party
description: Four amorous cheerleaders set out to save their ailing college football team by huddling up on the beach with the rival team...and scoring.

Title: 295. Fearless
description: An Italian private investigator tries to get to the bottom of a suspicious kidnapping case with the help of an exotic dancer.

Title: 296. Ankhiyon Ke Jharokhon Se
description: A young man must deal with a broken engagement ceremony, while his to-be fiancée waits to be treated for blood cancer.

Title: 297. The School Teacher in the House
description: Luisa, a Milanese piano teacher, relocates to Lucca to be with her love interest, Ferdinando 'Bonci' Marinotti.

Title: 298. O Bem Dotado - O Homem de Itu
description: Shy countryboy from Itu (a town in Brazil where everything is unusually big) is invited to work in the house of a rich woman, who ends up discovering the boy's hidden (and big) qualities...

Title: 299. Alessia... un vulcano sotto la pelle
300. The Children of Sanchez
description: The Sanchez clan has seen the worst of times living in impoverished Mexico but they have survived by sticking together. When Sanchez's oldest daughter Consuelo plans to change direction and build a life of her own, the family and Sanchez face an enormous challenge.

Title: 301. Half a Loaf of Kung Fu
description: A young man poses as "the Whip King" and collects the reward for a bandit he has seen killed by a famous bounty hunter. He must now learn Kung Fu if he is to live up to this new persona and conquer the enemies he has inherited.

Title: 302. Invincible Shaolin
description: A devious Qing general pits the South and the North Shaolin schools against each other by inviting three fighters from each school, makes them compete against each other, and whoever loses he kills, and blames it on the other school.

Title: 303. Die Sister, Die!
description: A man hires a nurse to care for his ailing but nasty and shrewish sister. What he really intends to do, however, is to convince the nurse to join him in a plot to kill her.

Title: 304. What's Up Superdoc!
description: A doctor fathers 837 brilliant sons through an artificial insemination program, and every woman wants a donation.

Title: 305. Sweeney 2
description: Second theatrical spin-off from the popular 1970's police series. Regan and Carter head a Flying Squad investigation into a series of bank raids by a team of well-armed villains who are flying in from the continent.

Title: 306. Attention, les enfants regardent
description: In a seaside villa, where under the care of a nanny, a group of children spend most of their days watching violent television shows.

Title: 307. Operation Orient
description: When a large amount of heroin in Greece is stolen from a criminal organization, the person initially responsible for the shipment is under considerable pressure to get it back.

Title: 308. Stony Island
description: Two struggling jazz musicians buck the odds in their attempt to form a band and take it on the road.

Title: 309. Silver Saddle
description: A young boy who sees his father gunned down kills the assassin. Years later, he has grown up to be a successful bounty hunter who is feared by many. And then one day he discovers secrets to his past...

Title: 310. The Astral Factor
description: A convicted strangler, studying the paranormal in his jail cell, learns to make himself invisible. As an invisible man, he escapes from prison to stalk and strangle the five women who testified against him at his trial. Robert Foxworth plays the police lieutenant assigned to protect them, and to catch the invisible strangler.

Title: 311. The Herd
description: Because of a local blood feud, a peasant family in eastern Turkey decides to sell its sheep in far away Ankara.

Title: 312. The Sorcerer's Apprentice
description: A young boy becomes an apprentice for a mysterious sorcerer, working at the sorcerer's strange and sinister mill where secretive black magic is being taught and performed at a very heavy price.

Title: 313. Orchestra Rehearsal
description: An orchestra assembles for a rehearsal in an ancient chapel under the inquisitive eyes of a TV documentary crew, but an uprising breaks out.

Title: 314. Tomorrow Never Comes
description: Coming back from an extended business trip, Frank discovers that his girlfriend Janie is now working at a new resort hotel where the owner has given her a permanent place to stay, as well as other gifts, in exchange for her affections. In the course of fighting over this development, tensions between Frank and Janie escalate out of control until he is holding her hostage in a standoff with the police. As the negotiators try to talk Frank into giving himself up, the desperate man feels himself being pushed further and further into a corner.

Title: 315. The Witness
description: A sexually adventurous young woman approaches Antonio, an Italian art-restorer working at a cathedral in France. He resists getting involved with her but later he finds out she was raped and murdered in a derelict house.

Title: 316. Cyclone
description: After a surprise cyclone hits the area, tourists become stranded on a boat in the sea, and they have to do anything in order to survive. To make matters even worse, they're joined by the survivors of a plane crash and a sinking boat.

Title: 317. Warriors Two
description: A bank cashier discovers a plot to kill the mayor. His attempt to warn the mayor is foiled, and he almost gets killed, but a mumbling Shaolin disciple rescues him and takes him to his master to teach him a formidable form of kung fu.

Title: 318. Pilgrim's Progress
description: Journey with Pilgrim as John Bunyan's famous allegory leaps from its pages to a movie.

Title: 319. Nighthawks
description: A homosexual man is forced to hide his sexuality by day while living his secret life by night.

Title: 320. The Tattoo Connection
description: An American insurance investigator goes to Hong Kong to retrieve a famous diamond stolen by a local criminal organization.

Title: 321. Along the Night
description: Babak who suffers from Leukemia falls in love with a famous singer named Parvaneh. Although at first she takes him for granted, but gradually a relationship begins that changes their lives.

Title: 322. The Alpha Incident
description: A microorganism from Mars, brought to Earth by a space probe, terrorizes passengers in a railroad office.

Title: 323. Mig og Charly
description: Steffen is picnicking with his girlfriend, daughter of a rich businessman, when he meets Charly - trying to steal Steffen's moped. Later they end up as BFFs despite the differences.

Title: 324. Summer Night Fever
description: Two buddies head off for a summer holiday, but one of them has to take his sister along. She cramps their style when it comes to picking up chicks. However, they manage to have some fun.

Title: 325. Enter the Fat Dragon
description: An apprentice farmer (Sammo Hung) ventures to the city and helps his family battle a gang of thugs.

Title: 326. Very Close Encounters of the Fourth Kind
description: Three nerdy students who have the hots for their sexy astronomy teacher and her pretty maid hit upon the idea of pretending to be outer-space aliens in the hopes of tricking the pair into going to bed with them.

Title: 327. The Biggest Battle
description: How World War II affected the lives of a German family and an American family, both of whom had sons and fathers fighting in the war.

Title: 328. Texas Detour
description: A trip across the United States takes a wrong turn when three California teenagers have their van stolen. Stranded in a backwoods town with the sheriff refusing to help, the trio decide to settle scores while getting justice.

Title: 329. Madman
description: While trying to escape from the Soviet Union, a Soviet Jewish man is locked in a mental institution, where he gets brutally tortured for several years. After his release, he's able to defect to Israel, and gets the chance to join the Israeli Army, even though he's not in good condition to fight. His next plan is to seek revenge against the Russians, but first he needs to go to another conflict on the Syrian border, far from where his enemies are.

Title: 330. O Construtor de Anjos
description: In the late 19th century, an English couple living in Portugal have to travel abroad. They leave their seven-year-old daughter in a convent where children are drowned in a lake, with their baptism being invoked against the forces of evil.

Title: 331. Feyzo, the Polite One
description: A poor peasant, Feyzo returns from military service dreaming about getting married to Gülo, the love of his life. However, he has to face many obstacles. According to tradition, a man has to pay a lot of money to the bride's father in order to get the bride's hand.

Title: 332. Carnival Nights
description: After a life of suffering and lies, three women decide to find some peace and love in a cabaret.

Title: 333. Money Movers
description: An armoured car company is the target of repeated heists. Company leadership is enforcing new measures in order to tighten security. The biggest danger of a new heist lies from within the company's own ranks.

Title: 334. Thayige Takka Maga
description: A young man joins a boxing club on his detective wife's behest to find out about the illegal activities carried out by the head of the club. And carried with an awesome mother sentiment.

Title: 335. Voglia di donna
description: A three segments sexy comedy.

Title: 337. Melody in Love
description: Young Melody arrives on Mauritius to visit her glamorous female cousin. Her sexual awakening begins there as she becomes fascinated with the island, the beautiful sexually liberated cousin, the cousin's lover and other characters.

Title: 338. Crazy Nights
description: Somewhat crazy semi-documentary by porn director Joe D'Amato is a strange series of Burlesque performances from around the globe. Actress and dancer Amanda Lear hosts these mostly musical numbers designed to get people naked on stage.

Title: 339. Trails
description: For his feature debut Monteiro creatively borrowed from traditional Portuguese legends to craft a series of echoing, parallel tales of young couples desperately escaping cruel false fathers, each couple on the run across different regions of the country and during increasingly contemporary time periods. A lyrical and profoundly cinematographic allegory with a glistening sharp political edge, Paths traces a pattern of repressive authority across Portuguese history while also pointing, with cautious optimism, towards the steady presence of youthful resistance. With its stunning choreography of landscape and use of a poetic, associative structure to evoke the longue durée of mythical time, Paths anticipates Monteiro's mid-career masterpiece Silvestre.

Title: 340. Sigappu Rojakkal
description: Kamal Haasan, the central character, is a man terribly soured by his unvaryingly devastating encounters with the opposite sex. He develops a pathological hatred for women and uses his charm to seduce young women and kill them immediately after having sex with each. These proceedings are recorded watched repeatedly by his adoptive father and mentor, another crazed woman-hater with a similarly disillusioning experience with the female sex, who vicariously enjoys his protege's exploits. The old man stays holed up in a far corner of the house watching his son carry out what he is too infirm to do.

Title: 341. Mag Wheels
description: Cool van-driving stud Steve gets the hots for Anita, who's the new girl in town. However, this doesn't go over well with Steve's bitchy and jealous girlfriend Donna, who sets Steve up by telling the cops that he's a cocaine dealer. Donna covers her tracks by claiming that Anita ratted Steve out to the cops. This in turn incurs the wrath of Steve's fellow van-driving buddies.

Title: 343. Desiderium
description: Desiderium lyrically charts the hapless loves of three brothers: Majid, the young handicapped brother with a deformed head who falls in love with Aghdas, a prostitute hired by his eldest brother Habib to entertain him, not knowing the truth about her profession. Karim, the middle brother is so infatuated with a quail that he almost completely ignores his wife and her emotions. Habib himself is in love with Foroogh, a tailor lady who lives with them, while his sense of responsibility about Majid keeps him from requiting her affections.

Title: 344. Shaolin Mantis
description: A young and learned martial artist is tasked by the Qing emperor to spy on dissents in another province who plan to overthrow him. He infiltrates the rebel leader's large estate by becoming his granddaughter's private live in tutor.

Title: 345. Strannaya zhenshchina
description: Zhenya dreamed not so much about love as about strong and open feelings. A lawyer by profession, she left her family, her son and, having arrived in a provincial town, devoted herself to her work and people who needed her protection. Then a man appeared who could not live without her.

Title: 346. Jokes My Folks Never Told Me
description: Anthology film consisting of dirty sex jokes turned into short, comical, occasionally animated and often offensive sketches which include hillbillies, cheating, stds, double entendres, misunderstandings and male on beast bestiality.

Title: 348. El patrullero 777
description: Follows Diogenes as he goes about his day as a police officer. He's prone to do things the right way, surrounded by a pretty much corrupt & citizen distant police department, & always resolves his duties with a personal method.

Title: 349. Fighting Mad
description: An American Vietnam soldier on his way home is left for dead and is saved by a pair of Japanese stragglers from WWII, who train him in the way of the samurai.

Title: 350. Primitif
description: After a raft accident in the jungle, three anthropology students and their guides attempt to escape from a primitive cannibal tribe that has hunted them down.

Title: 351. Magnificent Bodyguards
description: A Kung Fu master assembles guards to escort an ailing person through dangerous "Stormy Hills" terrain infested with bandits, savages, and evil monks to reach a doctor before it's too late.

Title: 352. Das Wirtshaus der sündigen Töchter
description: Lilli and Christl, blonde twins, live in the Upper Bavarian countryside. While Lilli is the prettier of the two and attracts a lot of male attention, Christl is a real country girl.

Title: 353. La banda del carro rojo
description: Drug dealers try to cross the US border.
